tooltip.kubejs.enchant_catalyst: §6§oUsed in the Enchanting Apparatus to enchant items.
tooltip.kubejs.hyper_enchant_catalyst: §6§oUsed in the Enchanting Apparatus to enchant items beyond their normal limit.
tooltip.kubejs.cataclysm_eyes: §7§oCannot§r§7 be used to open the End Portal
tooltip.kubejs.shadow_steel: §7Found in loot chests in Dimensional Dungeons
tooltip.kubejs.refined_radiance: §7Found in loot chests in Advanced Dimensional Dungeons.
tooltip.kubejs.unused_item_2: §7§oIf you found this item in Survival, there must have been an oversight.
tooltip.kubejs.withered_smithing_templat: §7§oObtained by defeating the Tainted Village Gate Pearl.
tooltip.kubejs.command_block_book: §7§oA reward for defeating the Withered Symbiont.
tooltip.kubejs.increase_carrying_capacit: §9When equipped, this item will allow you to carry +1 backpack.
actionbar.kubejs.depths_portal_error: §eYou can only use this portal in the Overworld or the Depths!
actionbar.kubejs.dragonrealm_portal_erro: §eYou can only use this portal in the Overworld or the Dragonrealm!
actionbar.kubejs.inbetween_portal_error: §eYou can only use this portal in the Overworld or the Inbetween!
actionbar.kubejs.wither_storm_gate_pearl: §eThis recipe can only be crafted after you have summoned the Wither Storm!
kubejs.tip.quests: The questbook has lots of useful information on progression.
kubejs.tip.the_bumblezone: If you can find a way to enter a beehive, you will enter The Bumblezone.
kubejs.tip.joke_the_bumblezone: If you can find a way to enter a beehive, you will find lots of bees inside.
kubejs.tip.twilight_forest: The Twilight Forest does not have enforced progression in this modpack. Explore the dimension at your own pace!
kubejs.tip.the_depths: Try cave-diving in the expansive caves of the Depths.
kubejs.tip.dragonrealm: The dragons from Ice and Fire all live in a dimension known as the Dragonrealm, but you can occasionally find their remains in the Depths dimension
kubejs.tip.the_inbetween: If you need to travel long distances, consider travelling through the Inbetween. One block there is equivalent to 32 in the overworld.
kubejs.tip.making_food: You can get bonus health for eating certain kinds of foods. Try making new things!
kubejs.tip.millstone: With the Millstone, you can crush ores for a chance to double them.
kubejs.tip.construction_wands: Construction wands will allow you to place multiple blocks at once.
kubejs.tip.construction_wands_2: You can control what block your Construction Wand will place by holding a block in your off hand.
kubejs.tip.spell_scrolls: Spell Scrolls that you find will be consumed on use, but if you inscribe them into a spellbook, they will last forever.
kubejs.tip.jade_armor: Jade Armor will make you immune to the wither and poison effects.
kubejs.tip.enchanting_apparatus: You can manually add enchantments to items using materials instead of experience with the Enchanting Apparatus.
kubejs.tip.enchant_catalyst: To enchant items using the Enchanting Apparatus, you will need an Enchanting Catalyst.
kubejs.tip.dim_dungeons_monsters: Enemies in the Dimensional Dungeons are a lot stronger than those you would face normally.
kubejs.tip.dim_dungeons_inscribing: The keys to the Dimensional Dungeons can only be used if they are first inscribed at a Key Inscribing Station or an End Portal Frame.
kubejs.tip.dim_dungeons_mystery: You can find the §kMeaningOfLife§r inside of the Advanced Dimensional Dungeons.
kubejs.tip.summoning_altar: Around the Overworld, you can occasionally find a Summoning Altar. By offering it certain things, you can summon rare mobs and items into your world.
kubejs.tip.end_portal: To open the End Portal in this modpack, you need to craft 12 of the 16 available ender eyes.
kubejs.tip.hephaestus_forge: The Hephaestus Forge can be upgraded. In fact, there are lots of recipes which require a certain tier of forge or higher.
kubejs.tip.mod_guidebooks: A lot of mods come with in-game documentation in the form of guide books. Be sure to consult them if you can.
kubejs.tip.cooking_pot_heat: A Cooking Pot will only work with a heat source beneath it.
kubejs.tip.pet_bed: Try making a pet bed. It will allow your pets to respawn.
kubejs.tip.trophies: There are trophies you can collect for completing all sorts of tasks!
kubejs.tip.amethyst_magic: Amethyst has a multitute of magical applications.
kubejs.tip.gate_pearl: Conquer the waves of mobs summoned by a Gate Pearl to earn lots of rare rewards.
kubejs.tip.tarot_cards: In the questbook, you can get powerful tarot cards for completing specific advancements. These will only work while equipped as a curio.
kubejs.tip.curios: You can find special trinkets which can be equipped in your Curio slots.
kubejs.tip.experience_obelisk: The Experience Obelisk can store your xp levels for safekeeping.
kubejs.tip.tropics: Drinking a Piña Colada at sunset transports you to an idyllic paradise, figuratively and literally!
kubejs.tip.photography: Capture the world around you with a camera!
kubejs.tip.hot_air_balloon: Try making a hot-air balloon for an inefficient, but stylistic, way to fly!
kubejs.tip.hex_casting_and_psi: If you're brave enough to learn them, try out the Hex Casting and Psi mods!
kubejs.tip.cataclysm_discs: Did you know that the bosses from the Cataclysm mod drop their own music discs?
kubejs.tip.wines: There is a reward for creating every type of wine.
kubejs.tip.bee_queen: The Bee Queen has a long, but very rewarding quest for those who want to help her.
kubejs.tip.alexs_caves: The Spelunkery Table can help you find some very unique and very rare caves biomes in the Overworld.
kubejs.tip.game_discs_1: Bees, Slimes, Frogs, and Rabbits all drop unique items when killed by a Skeleton...
kubejs.tip.game_discs_2: You can occasionally find video game cartridges in certain structures.
kubejs.tip.bundle: In this modpack you can craft bundles!
kubejs.tip.bottle_of_daydream: Phantoms keeping you down? Craft or buy a Bottle o' Daydream from the shop!
kubejs.tip.shop_maps: Looking for a specific biome or structure? The shop might sell a map to it!
kubejs.tip.mob_transport: The Ender Lead and Quantum Catcher can help you transport mobs easily.
kubejs.tip.mechanical_generator: With the Mechanical Generator, you can easily generate large amounts of any stone!
kubejs.tip.copycat_blocks: You can use zinc to make Copycat Blocks, which can mimic the appearance of other blocks.
kubejs.tip.totem_of_the_void: The Totem of the Void will save you from falling into the void once and will trigger from anywhere in your inventory.
kubejs.tip.potion_candles: Potion Candles can imbue status effects to nearby entities.
kubejs.tip.ambience_discs: If a Skeleton kills a Spider, it will drop a special kind of music disc.
kubejs.tip.elytra_campfire_boost: Flying over a campfire with an Elytra will give you a boost!
kubejs.tip.hoes: Hoes can break a 3x3 area of grass, and some can even break a 5x5 area!
kubejs.tip.pickarang: The Pickarang is a pickaxe boomerang! It will even bring the blocks it breaks back to you!
kubejs.tip.slime_bucket: You can put slimes in buckets!
kubejs.tip.player_heads: If a Witch kills a named Snow Golem, it will drop a player head corresponding to the golem's name.
kubejs.tip.tiny_potato: A Tiny Potato makes a great companion.
kubejs.tip.lure_villagers: Villagers will follow you around if you hold an emerald block
kubejs.tip.soul_bead: A Soul Bead can be used to locate a Nether Fortress much like an Eye of Ender.
kubejs.tip.straw: You can get straw by breaking grass with a knife.
kubejs.tip.knife_ingredients: There are a lot of ingredients which can only be obtained by killing a mob with a knife.
kubejs.tip.toolbelt: The Tool Belt can hold unstackable items and allow you to switch between them easily.
kubejs.tip.stella_arcanum: Stellarite can only be found in the Dragonrealm.
kubejs.tip.ruby_ore: In The Depths, ruby ore can be found in the Dragon's Hollow biome.
kubejs.tip.onyx_ore: In The Depths, onyx ore can be found in the Crimson Caves biome.
kubejs.tip.jade_ore: In The Depths, jade ore can be found in the Mossy Fields biome.
kubejs.tip.aquamarine_ore: In The Depths, aquamarine ore can be found in the Asurine Caves biome.
kubejs.tip.ruby_ore_nether: In the Nether, you can find ruby ore near the bedrock roof.
questbook.kubejs.hovertext.cooking_pot: These foods are made using a Cooking Pot.
questbook.kubejs.hovertext.crafting_tabl: These foods are made using a Crafting Table.
kubejs.edge_of_the_world: Gateway to the Edge of the World
enchantment.wan_ancient_beasts.hunter_ma: Deals more damage to animals and ancient beasts.
enchantment.wan_ancient_beasts.blood_thi: Makes you deal more damage while under any potion effect.
enchantment.wan_ancient_beasts.life_stea: Makes you absorb half a heart for every hit you deal to your enemy.
effect.farmersdelight.comfort.desc: Provides natural regeneration, regardless of how hungry you are.
effect.farmersdelight.nourishment.desc: Prevents hunger loss, except when using saturation to heal damage.
effect.twilightdelight.aurora_glowing.de: Makes you and all entities you see glow with rainbow color.
effect.twilightdelight.fire_range.desc: Ignite enemies around you, and you cannot be ignited.
effect.twilightdelight.poison_range.desc: Poison enemies around you, and grants immunity to poison.
Reduce movement speed and attack damage.
effect.aether.inebriation.desc: Inflicts damage over time and causes random movement.
effect.aether.remedy.desc: Cures and grants immunity to inebriation.
effect.wan_ancient_beasts.fear.desc: Makes you unable to control your character.
effect.wan_ancient_beasts.alpha.desc: Increases your damage by half a heart for each kill.
effect.galosphere.astral.desc: Allows you to walk through walls and floors.
effect.galosphere.block_bane.desc: Damages you when you place blocks.
effect.vinery.jellie.desc: Provides the same but greater benefits than Golden Apples.
effect.vinery.creeper_effect.desc: Causes the player to explode after a few seconds. Kaboom!
effect.vinery.frosty_armor.desc: Increases armor and attack damage but decreases movement speed.
effect.vinery.health_effect.desc: Increases maximum health for the duration of this effect.
effect.vinery.magnet.desc: Attracts items within a small radius to the player.
effect.vinery.party_effect.desc: Triggers fireworks that deal damage when hitting entities.
alexsmobs.potion.bug_pheromones.desc: Make hostile arthropods neutral to the user.
alexsmobs.potion.debilitating_sting.desc: An effect which poisons the victim but paralyzes arthropods. It will stop if the victim is at half health and is not an arthropod.
alexsmobs.potion.ender_flu.desc: After the effect runs out naturally, the user takes massive damage and an Enderiophage will spawn.
alexsmobs.potion.fear.desc: Makes the target unable to move.
alexsmobs.potion.fleet_footed.desc: Increases player speed whilst jumping and sprinting.
alexsmobs.potion.mosquito_repellent.desc: Makes Crimson Mosquitoes avoid the player.
alexsmobs.potion.oiled.desc: Oil floats on water. Float on the surface of water and outside in the rain.
alexsmobs.potion.power_down.desc: Hello, hello? Uhh, I wanted to record a message for you...
alexsmobs.potion.soulsteal.desc: Grants the user attacks some life-steal.
alexsmobs.potion.sunbird_blessing.desc: Decreases fall speed, prevents fall damage and makes it easier to fly with an Elytra or Tarantula Hawk Elytra.
alexsmobs.potion.sunbird_curse.desc: Increases fall speed, causing the user to hit the ground quicker. This effectively impedes the use of an Elytra.
alexsmobs.potion.tigers_blessing.desc: Tigers near the user will be neutral and will protect them from hostile foes.
A protection buff granted by using Divine Tools.
effect.ancient_aether.natures_boost.desc: Makes the player jump high into the air and fertilizes the ground once they land.
effect.ars_elemental.enderference.desc: Makes the target unable to teleport or be teleported.
effect.ars_elemental.enthralled.desc: Enthralled mobs won't attack the caster but defend them.
effect.ars_elemental.hellfire.desc: The magic flames burns even nether creatures making them vulnerable to fire. It slighly increase healing at the cost of losing the invulnerability window when that happens.
effect.ars_elemental.hymn_of_order.desc: Sets the player's mana to 1 and disables spellcasting.
effect.ars_elemental.life_link.desc: Caster will split incoming damage with the target and the target will split incoming healing with the caster. Using Cut will dispel the effect on both sides.
effect.ars_elemental.mana_shield.desc: Use mana to mitigate damage taken and add a chance to not suffer from negative effects.
effect.ars_elemental.static_charged.desc: Calls a lightning to hit the afflicted when the duration ends.
effect.ars_elemental.venom.desc: The target is poisoned with a deadly venom and takes more damage from poison spores.
effect.ars_elemental.watery_grave.desc: Makes the target sink and run out of air quicker.
effect.arsdelight.freezing_spell.desc: Spell damage also inflicts freezing effect.
effect.arsdelight.wilden.desc: Gain max mana, mana restoration, and spell damage.
effect.irons_spellbooks.abyssal_shroud.d: Dodge any attack while under its effects, taking no damage.
effect.irons_spellbooks.airborne.desc: You are vulnerable to taking kinetic damage.
effect.irons_spellbooks.ascension.desc: Provides lingering weightlessness from the Ascension spell.
effect.irons_spellbooks.blight.desc: Decreases your outgoing damage by 5% per level and incoming healing by 10% per level.
effect.irons_spellbooks.charged.desc: Increases attack damage by 10% per level, spell power by 5% per level, and speed by 20% per level.
effect.irons_spellbooks.chilled.desc: Decreases movement speed and doubles incoming freeze time.
Non-magical attacks will leave an echo of ender energy behind, shortly thereafter exploding with an echo of the attack's damage.
effect.irons_spellbooks.enchanted_ward.d: Your body rapidly degrades under this oppressive magic field.
effect.irons_spellbooks.evasion.desc: Teleport away from any attack while under its effects, taking no damage.
effect.irons_spellbooks.gluttony.desc: Converts food eaten into mana based on its nutrition.
effect.irons_spellbooks.guided.desc: Nearby projectiles are attracted towards you.
effect.irons_spellbooks.hastened.desc: Increases movement speed, attack speed, mining speed, mana regeneration, and cast time reduction.
effect.irons_spellbooks.heartstop.desc: Become temporarily invulnerable, but take 50% of accumulated damage once it wears off.
effect.irons_spellbooks.oakskin.desc: Grants 15% damage reduction, and an additional 5% per level.
effect.irons_spellbooks.polar_bear_timer: Displays the duration remaining on your summons.
effect.irons_spellbooks.raise_dead_timer: Displays the duration remaining on your summons.
effect.irons_spellbooks.rend.desc: Decreases your armor by 5% per level.
effect.irons_spellbooks.spider_aspect.de: Increases your damage dealt against targets with poison by 5% per level.
effect.irons_spellbooks.summon_horse_tim: Displays the duration remaining on your summons.
effect.irons_spellbooks.slowed.desc: Decreases movement speed, attack speed, mining speed, mana regeneration, and cast time reduction.
effect.irons_spellbooks.thunderstorm.des: Small bolts of lightning strike nearby creatures every 2 seconds.
effect.irons_spellbooks.true_invisibilit: Your body as well as armor and items become invisible.
effect.irons_spellbooks.vex_timer.desc: Displays the duration remaining on your summons.
effect.irons_spellbooks.vigor.desc: Gain 1 additional heart of max hp per level.
effect.minecraft.slow_falling.desc: Causes you to float down slowly.
effect.minecraft.hero_of_the_village.des: Recieve gifts and discounts from villagers.
effect.alexscaves.bubbled.desc: Causes you to be slowed and drowned.
effect.alexscaves.magnetizing.desc: Causes you to be affected by Neodymium blocks without needing magnetic armor.
effect.alexscaves.rage.desc: Deal more damage the lower your health is.
effect.alexscaves.stunned.desc: Causes you to be unable to move or attack.
effect.alexscaves.sugar_rush.desc: You have had too much sugar.
effect.ars_nouveau.bounce.desc: Causes you to bounce off the ground.
effect.ars_nouveau.familiar_sickness.des: Causes you to be unable to summon a Familiar.
effect.ars_nouveau.glide.desc: Allows you to fly as if wearing Elytra.
effect.ars_nouveau.gravity.desc: Causes you to take double fall damage, and disables flight.
effect.ars_nouveau.hex.desc: Cuts Mana and health regeneration in half.
effect.ars_nouveau.scrying.desc: You can see a certain block through other blocks.
effect.ars_nouveau.snared.desc: Prevents you from moving or jumping.
effect.ars_nouveau.summoning_sickness.de: Causes you to be unable to cast a summoning spell.
effect.the_bumblezone.beenergized.desc: Increase flying speed of most flying mobs. With the Bumblebee Chestplate, you can fly farther and longer.
effect.the_bumblezone.hidden.desc: Reduces range of initial detection by hostile mobs.
effect.the_bumblezone.paralyzed.descript: Causes you to be unable to move.
effect.the_bumblezone.protection_of_the_: Calms all nearby bees that were angry at whoever has this effect.
Will strengthen and make all nearby bees in The Bumblezone angry at you!
